title: Pixel 4a5G charges with USB-C to USB-C but not USB-A to USB-C.
content:
Phone is brand new, it will charge happily with any number of USB-C chargers. The moment I put a USB-A to USB-C cable on the phone it doesn't see it. The A-C cable is OEM google.
The USB-A to C cable works fine on my 3XL.
What's going on, what's so different with the cable/phone where it won't work?

I've had the phone for less than a week.
